438.title: Scholastic Book Services
notes: American comics publisher (reprint collections, etc.) and general publisher for school-age children. The company later calls itself "Scholastic, Inc.", and sometimes it is "Scholastic Books" or "Scholastic Press." These forms are included below in a single list by book title. Magazines published by "Scholastic, Inc." are included in the list under Scholastic Magazines.
